com.guimonsters.client.events

Class LoggedOutListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guimonsters.client.events.ConsoleListener
      • com.guimonsters.client.events.LoggedOutListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class LoggedOutListener
extends ConsoleListener
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    Key listener for the LOGGED_OUT state. Provides the user with the option to create an account or log in.
    Version:
    1.00, 2013-04-18
    Author:
    Elijah Atkinson

      LoggedOutListener(MudClient client)

    • Method Detail

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Enter Key Event Handler for the LOGGED_OUT and LOGGING_IN states. Triggers if the console is focused and the Enter Key is pressed while the client is in the LOGGED_OUT or LOGGING_IN state.
        Specified by:
        keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener
        Parameters:
        e - The KeyEvent object passed by the activated JComponent.
